title: Bitter gourd lentil curry | Kakarakaya Senagapappu Kura 😋 | Side Dish
content:
Side Dish: Bitter Gourd Lentil Curry  Servings: 4 Duration: 20 mins Any Indian meal contains Dal, curry, rice, roti and curd it’s so authentic and traditional to have a meal with curries. It’s a complete meal in lunch Curry is a side dish either wet/ dry prepared out of vegetables/ leafy vegetables. It should be cooked and make sure it contain some amount of nutrients in it for good healthy diet. Health Benefits of Bitter Gourd: Today, I prepared Bitter Gourd lentil curry which turned out tasty and a comfort side dish with rice 🍚 Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Bitter Gourd - 1 Bowl - Steamed
  • Bengal gram - 120 gms - Boiled & gently mashed
  • Green chillies - 4
  • Onion - 1 medium sized - finely chopped
  • Tomatoes - 2 - Puree
  • Dry Red chilly - 1
  • Mustard seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 6 - chopped
  • Asafoetida / Hing - 1/4 tsp
  • Red chilly Powder- 1 tsp
  • Sambar Powder - 1 tsp
  • Coriander Powder - 1 tsp
  • Jaggery pieces - 2 or 2 Tb sp powder
  • Tamarind pulp - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Fresh coconut - Grated - 1/4 cup
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Coriander leaves - 1 small cup
  • Oil - 2 Tb sp
Procedure:
  • Heat skillet pan or deep frying pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves, green chillies, dry Red chilly & hing
  • Saute & Add chopped onion
  • Mix well & Add salt, red chilly powder, Sambar powder, turmeric powder, jaggery, tamarind extract, coconut & coriander powder
  • Mix well & Saute 2 minutes
  • Next Add Tomato puree, Mix well and cook 5 minutes
  • Then add cooked dal & 200 ml water, combine well
  • Next Add bitter gourd, gently mix and close with lid
  • Cook 10-15 minutes on low heat
  • Turn off heat & Add chopped coriander leaves
  • Mix well & serve hot with rice 🍚
  • Happy cooking 😌 & Have a great day ☀️
